title: The Rainbow Trail
description: A decade after Jane Withersteen, Lassiter, and their adopted daughter, Fay Larkin, escape through Deception Pass, the family faces new trials when Fay is abducted for marriage by a local Mormon group. As Fay struggles against a forced marriage, she encounters John Shefford, a cowboy searching for a new life, and who may be the only one who can free her.The sequel to Zane Greyâ€™s bestselling Riders of the Purple Sage, The Rainbow Trail was also published under the title The Desert Crucible.
author: Zane Grey
